text: Arch of Triumph is a 1948 American World War II romantic drama movie directed by Lewis Milestone and based on the 1945 novel of the same name by Erich Maria Remarque. It stars Ingrid Bergman, Charles Boyer, Charles Laughton, Ruth Warrick, Norman Lloyd, Stephen Bekassy and was distributed by United Artists. It was remade in 1985 for a Television film. ==Other websites== * * Category:1948 war movies Category:1948 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Arch of Triumph (1948 movie)
